channel.title: [317] Integer Wont Save [317]
channel.description:
Hi guys, so my server is making a new project that we have to collect 5K bucket of waters and give to the chemist for a new potion, and it's going great, everyone is participating. But whenever someone loggs out, it still does save, but when I turn off server or restart the server it just starts from 0 again.
Is there any fix to this? If there is, please post. All help is appreciated :)

item.title: [317] Integer Wont Save [317]
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Ok, does anyone else know how to save it?

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Integer Wont Save [317]
item.dc:creator: @yeoldhag yeoldhag
item.description:
@yeoldhag wrote:

Ok assuming your using PI…
In playersave.java
Add your variable or what ever in between something like this:
} else if (token.equals(“pcPoints”)) {
p.pcPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);

				} else if (token.equals("duel-points")) {
					p.duelpoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);

__
Then scroll down and look for this:

		characterfile.newLine();
		characterfile.write("pcPoints = ", 0, 11);
		characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.pcPoints), 0,

Integer.toString(p.pcPoints).length());
characterfile.newLine();
characterfile.write("duel-points = ", 0, 14);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.duelpoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.duelpoints).length());

Copy and paste that and use your variables information or what ever. That should save it.

Read full topic
